subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Though he has always had a knack for scoring, striker Gonzalo Higuaín is becoming a world-class goal poacher. That is all Argentina needs him to be.
snippet: Though he has always had a knack for scoring, striker Gonzalo Higuaín is becoming a world-class goal poacher. That is all Argentina needs him to be.
